dict.string:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import json import urllib
__author__ = 'Htedsv'
theQuery = "{query}"
rssurl = 'http://www.godic.net/dicts/prefix/' + urllib.quote(theQuery) print "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>\n<items>"
try: txt = urllib.urlopen(rssurl).read() items = txt[2:-2].split('},{')
for x in items: v_st = x.find('"value"')+9 v_ed = x.find('"', v_st) title = x[v_st:v_ed]
l_st = x.find('"label"')+9 l_ed = x.find('"', l_st) sub = x[l_st:l_ed] title = title.replace('\\r', ' ') title = title.replace('\\n', ' ') sub = sub.replace('\\r', ' ') sub = sub.replace('\\n', ' ')
link = 'http://www.godic.net/dicts/de/'+urllib.quote(title)
print " <item uid=\"YYeTs\" arg=\""+ link +"\">" print " <title>" + title + "</title>" print " <subtitle>" + sub + "</subtitle>" print ''' <icon type="fileicon">./icon.png</icon></item>''' except Exception, e: print " <item uid=\"YYeTs\" arg=\""+ 'http://www.godic.net/dicts/de/'+urllib.quote(theQuery) +"\">" print " <title>" + "在线搜索"+theQuery + "</title>" print " <subtitle>" + "..." + "</subtitle>" print ''' <icon type="fileicon">./icon.png</icon></item>''' print "</items>\n"
